Package org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation

Annotation Type XmlConfig

@Target({TYPE,METHOD})
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Inherited
@ContextApply({SerializerApply.class,ParserApply.class})
public @interface XmlConfig
Annotation for specifying config properties defined in XmlSerializer, XmlDocSerializer, and XmlParser.

Used primarily for specifying bean configuration properties on REST classes and methods.

  • XML Details

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements 
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    java.lang.String addBeanTypes
    Add "_type" properties when needed.
    java.lang.String addNamespaceUrisToRoot
    Add namespace URLs to the root element.
    java.lang.String defaultNamespace
    Default namespace.
    java.lang.String disableAutoDetectNamespaces
    Don't auto-detect namespace usage.
    java.lang.String enableNamespaces
    Enable support for XML namespaces.
    java.lang.Class<? extends javax.xml.stream.util.XMLEventAllocator> eventAllocator
    XML event allocator.
    java.lang.String[] namespaces
    Default namespaces.
    java.lang.String preserveRootElement
    Preserve root element during generalized parsing.
    int rank
    Optional rank for this config.
    java.lang.Class<? extends javax.xml.stream.XMLReporter> reporter
    XML reporter.
    java.lang.Class<? extends javax.xml.stream.XMLResolver> resolver
    XML resolver.
    java.lang.String validating
    Enable validation.

  • Element Details

    • rank

      int rank
      Optional rank for this config.

      Can be used to override default ordering and application of config annotations.

      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      0

    • eventAllocator

      java.lang.Class<? extends javax.xml.stream.util.XMLEventAllocator> eventAllocator
      XML event allocator.

      Associates an XMLEventAllocator with this parser.

      • XmlParser.Builder.eventAllocator(Class)
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlEventAllocator.Void.class

    • preserveRootElement

      java.lang.String preserveRootElement
      Preserve root element during generalized parsing.

      If "true", when parsing into a generic JsonMap, the map will contain a single entry whose key is the root element name.

      • "true"
      • "false" (default)
      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlParser.Builder.preserveRootElement()
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • reporter

      java.lang.Class<? extends javax.xml.stream.XMLReporter> reporter
      XML reporter.

      Associates an XMLReporter with this parser.

      • Reporters are not copied to new parsers during a clone.
      • XmlParser.Builder.reporter(Class)
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlReporter.Void.class

    • resolver

      java.lang.Class<? extends javax.xml.stream.XMLResolver> resolver
      XML resolver.

      Associates an XMLResolver with this parser.

      • XmlParser.Builder.resolver(Class)
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlResolver.Void.class

    • validating

      java.lang.String validating
      Enable validation.

      If "true", XML document will be validated.

      See XMLInputFactory.IS_VALIDATING for more info.

      • "true"
      • "false" (default)
      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlParser.Builder.validating()
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • addBeanTypes

      java.lang.String addBeanTypes
      Add "_type" properties when needed.

      If "true", then "_type" properties will be added to beans if their type cannot be inferred through reflection.

      When present, this value overrides the Serializer.Builder.addBeanTypes() setting and is provided to customize the behavior of specific serializers in a SerializerSet.

      • "true"
      • "false" (default)
      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlSerializer.Builder.addBeanTypesXml()
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • addNamespaceUrisToRoot

      java.lang.String addNamespaceUrisToRoot
      Add namespace URLs to the root element.

      Use this setting to add xmlns:x attributes to the root element for the default and all mapped namespaces.

      • "true"
      • "false" (default)
      • This setting is ignored if XmlSerializer.Builder.enableNamespaces() is not enabled.
      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlSerializer.Builder.addNamespaceUrisToRoot()
      • Namespaces
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • disableAutoDetectNamespaces

      java.lang.String disableAutoDetectNamespaces
      Don't auto-detect namespace usage.

      Don't detect namespace usage before serialization.

      Used in conjunction with XmlSerializer.Builder.addNamespaceUrisToRoot() to reduce the list of namespace URLs appended to the root element to only those that will be used in the resulting document.

      If disabled, then the data structure will first be crawled looking for namespaces that will be encountered before the root element is serialized.

      This setting is ignored if XmlSerializer.Builder.enableNamespaces() is not enabled.

      • "true"
      • "false" (default)
      • Auto-detection of namespaces can be costly performance-wise.
        In high-performance environments, it's recommended that namespace detection be disabled, and that namespaces be manually defined through the XmlSerializer.Builder.namespaces(Namespace...) property.
      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlSerializer.Builder.disableAutoDetectNamespaces()
      • Namespaces
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • defaultNamespace

      java.lang.String defaultNamespace
      Default namespace.

      Specifies the default namespace URI for this document.

      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlSerializer.Builder.defaultNamespace(Namespace)
      • Namespaces
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • enableNamespaces

      java.lang.String enableNamespaces
      Enable support for XML namespaces.

      If not enabled, XML output will not contain any namespaces regardless of any other settings.

      • "true"
      • "false" (default)
      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlSerializer.Builder.enableNamespaces()
      • Namespaces
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      ""

    • namespaces

      java.lang.String[] namespaces
      Default namespaces.

      The default list of namespaces associated with this serializer.

      • Supports VarResolver.DEFAULT (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
      • XmlSerializer.Builder.namespaces(Namespace...)
      • Namespaces
      Returns:
      The annotation value.
      Default:
      {}
